CVE-2019-0213.body: Apache Archiva is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2019-12196.title: Zoho ManageEngine NetFlow Analyzer CVE-2019-12196 SQL Injection Vulnerability

CVE-2019-12247.title: QEMU CVE-2019-12247 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-12247.body: QEMU is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU instance, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.QEMU version 3.0.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-12382.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2019-12382 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2019-12382.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Linux kernel 5.1.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-12495.title: Tiny C Compiler CVE-2019-12495 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-12495.body: Tiny C Compiler is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.TinyCC 0.9.27 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-12616.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2019-12616 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2019-12616.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it does not properly validate HTTP requests. CVE-2019-12766.title: Joomla! Core CVE-2019-12766 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilitiy

CVE-2019-7844.title: Adobe Media Encoder CVE-2019-7844 Out of Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2019-7844.body: Adobe Media Encoder is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.Adobe Media Encoder 13.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-8278.title: Invision Power Board CVE-2019-8278 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8278.body: Invision Power Board is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Invision Power Board 3.3.1 through 3.4.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-8285.title: Kaspersky Antivirus Engine CVE-2019-8285 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8285.body: Kaspersky Anti-Virus Engine is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to cause a denial-of-service condition, but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2019-8286.title: Multiple Kaspersky Products CVE-2019-8286 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8286.body: Multiple Kaspersky Products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.The following products and versions are vulnerable: Kaspersky Anti-Virus and 2019 prior Kaspersky Internet Security and 2019 prior Kaspersky Total Security and 2019 prior

CVE-2019-8443.title: Atlassian JIRA CVE-2019-8443 Authorization Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8443.body: Atlassian JIRA is prone to an authorization-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Jira versions prior to 7.13.4, 8.0.0 through 8.0.3, and 8.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-8920.title: XAMPP CVE-2019-8920 Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8920.body: XAMPP for Linux is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.XAMPP version 1.7.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-8923.title: XAMPP 'cds-fpdf.php' SQL-injection and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-8923.body: XAMPP is prone to an SQL-injection and multiple HTML Injection vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.XAMPP 5.6.8 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2019-8924.title: XAMPP 'cds-fpdf.php' SQL-injection and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-8924.body: XAMPP is prone to an SQL-injection and multiple HTML Injection vulnerabilities. CVE-2019-8943.title: WordPress CVE-2019-8943 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8943.body: WordPress is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information or execute arbitrary code. This may aid in further attacks. WordPress 5.0.3 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-8987.title: Multiple TIBCO Products CVE-2019-8987 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8987.body: Multiple TIBCO products are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.The following products are affected:TIBCO Data Science for AWS versions 6.4.0 and priorTIBCO Spotfire Data Science versions 6.4.0 and prior

CVE-2019-8989.title: Multiple TIBCO products CVE-2019-8989 Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8989.body: Multiple TIBCO Products are prone to a spoofing vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to conduct spoofing attacks and perform unauthorized actions; other attacks are also possible.The following TIBCO products are affected:TIBCO Data Science for AWS versions 6.4.0 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO Spotfire Data Science versions 6.4.0 and prior are vulnerable

CVE-2019-8990.title: TIBCO ActiveMatrix BusinessWorks CVE-2019-8990 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2019-8990.body: TIBCO ActiveMatrix BusinessWorks is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. TIBCO ActiveMatrix BusinessWorks 6.4.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-8991.title: TIBCO Active Matrix Service Grid CVE-2019-8991 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-8991.body: TIBCO Active Matrix Service Grid is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities.An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials or perform unauthorized actions. Other attacks may also be possible. The following TIBCO ActiveMatrix BPM versions are vulnerable:TIBCO ActiveMatrix BPM version 4.2.0 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO Silver Fabric for ActiveMatrix BPM Distribution version 4.2.0 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO ActiveMatrix Policy Director version 1.1.0 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO ActiveMatrix Service Bus version 3.3.0 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO ActiveMatrix Service Grid version 3.3.1 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO Silver Fabric for ActiveMatrix Service Grid Distribution version 3.3.0 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO Silver Fabric Enabler for ActiveMatrix BPM version 1.4.1 and prior are vulnerableTIBCO Silver Fabric Enabler for ActiveMatrix Service Grid version 1.3.1 and prior are vulnerable

CVE-2019-11831.body: The PharStreamWrapper package for TYPO3 is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to write or retrieve arbitrary files from the affected system in the context of the application or bypass certain security restrictions. An attacker can exploit this issue to conduct spoofing attacks and perform unauthorized actions; other attacks are also possible.IBM Content Navigator 3.0 version is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-4040.title: IBM i CVE-2019-4040 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4040.body: IBM i is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM i version 7.2 and 7.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-4047.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service CVE-2019-4047 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4047.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.Jazz Reporting Service 6.0.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-4051.title: IBM API Connect CVE-2019-4051 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4051.body: IBM API Connect is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. IBM API Connect 2018.1 through 2018.4.1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-4055.title: IBM MQ and MQ Appliance CVE-2019-4055 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4055.body: IBM MQ is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.The following product and versions are affected:IBM MQ and MQ Appliance from versions 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.0.10, 9.0.0.0 through 9.0.0.5, 9.1.0.0 through 9.1.0.1 and 9.1.0 through 9.1.1

CVE-2019-4061.title: IBM BigFix Platform CVE-2019-4061 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4061.body: IBM BigFix Platform is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. IBM BigFix Platform versions 9.2 through 9.2.16 and 9.5 through 9.5.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-4101.title: IBM DB2 CVE-2019-4101 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4101.body: IBM DB2 is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. IBM DB2 10.1, 10.5, 11.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-4137.title: IBM Spectrum Control Cross Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-4137.body: IBM Spectrum Control is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and an information-disclosure vulnerabilities.An attacker may leverage these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information and to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.The following products are affected:IBM Spectrum Control 5.2.13 through 5.2.17.2IBM Spectrum Control 5.3.0 through 5.3.2

CVE-2019-4139.title: IBM Cognos Analytics CVE-2019-4139 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4139.body: IBM Cognos Analytics is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2019-4154.title: IBM DB2 CVE-2019-4154 Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4154.body: IBM DB2 is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges.IBM Db2 versions 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-4184.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service CVE-2019-4184 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4184.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM Jazz Reporting Service 6.0, 6.0.1, 6.0.2, 6.0.3, 6.0.4, 6.0.5, 6.0.6 and 6.0.6.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-4202.body: IBM API Connect is prone to a command-injection vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in context of the vulnerable application.IBM API Connect versions 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.8.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-4204.title: Multiple IBM Products CVE-2019-4204 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4204.body: Multiple IBM Products are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. IBM Sterling B2B Integrator versions 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-4303.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management CVE-2019-4303 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability

CVE-2019-4384.title: IBM Campaign CVE-2019-4384 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2019-4384.body: IBM Campaign is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access and write arbitrary files or to execute arbitrary files.IBM Campaign versions 9.1.2, and 10.1 are vulnerable.

KCodes NetUSB.ko versions 1.0.2.66 and 1.0.2.69 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-5439.title: VLC Media Player CVE-2019-5439 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-5439.body: VLC media player is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Versions prior to VLC media player 3.0.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-5716.body: Wireshark is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the affected application or to consume excess memory, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2019-9779.title: GNU LibreDWG Multiple Security Vulnerabilities.
CVE-2019-9779.body: GNU LibreDWG is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions.GNU LibreDWG 0.7 and 0.7.1645 versions are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-9787.title: WordPress CVE-2019-9787 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2019-9787.body: WordPress is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.Versions prior to WordPress 5.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-9848.title: LibreOffice Remote Code Execution and Unauthorized Access Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-9848.body: LibreOffice is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability and unauthorized-access vulnerability.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application and gain unauthorized access and perform malicious actions. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.LibreOffice versions prior to 6.2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-9849.title: LibreOffice Remote Code Execution and Unauthorized Access Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-9849.body: LibreOffice is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability and unauthorized-access vulnerability.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application and gain unauthorized access and perform malicious actions. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.LibreOffice versions prior to 6.2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-9903.title: Poppler CVE-2019-9903 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-9903.body: Poppler is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.Poppler 0.74.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-9936.title: SQLite Information Disclosure and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-9936.body: SQLite is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information or to consume excessive resources, resulting in a denial of service.SQLite 3.27.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-9937.title: SQLite Information Disclosure and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2019-9937.body: SQLite is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information or to consume excessive resources, resulting in a denial of service.SQLite 3.27.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-9948.title: Python urllib CVE-2019-9948 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2019-9948.body: Python is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.Python 2.x through 2.7.16 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-9956.title: ImageMagick CVE-2019-9956 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-9956.body: ImageMagick is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions.ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 Q16 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2019-9956.title: Dovecot CVE-2019-7524 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2019-9956.body: Dovecot is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions.Dovecot versions 2.0.14 through 2.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2019-9970.title: Signal CVE-2019-9970 Homograph Domain Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2019-9970.body: Signal is prone to a domain-spoofing vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle homographs in international domain name (IDN) domains. An attacker may leverage this issue to spoof a domain that visually resembles a legitimate domain. This may lead to a false sense of trust because the user may be presented with a URI of a seemingly trusted domain while interacting with the attacker's malicious site.The following products and versions are vulnerable:Signal Desktop through 1.23.1Signal Private Messenger through 4.35.3
